name: Toodice2
description:
Toodice is a simple arcade game for iOS and android. The aim is to hit the dice with the highest number and break every record!

This project was developed in one week on Unity using Playmaker.

Ver 1.0.2 BETA
(TestFlight - Waiting for Google for Android)

  • Game basics
  • 10 unlockable dice
  • Advertising inserted
  • in-app purchase added (Beta participants can purchase the in-app purchase for free).
